data.title: Thriller (Genre)
data.meta_description: Film Genres - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides an overview of common film genres and their descriptions. It lists seven major genres: comedy, horror, action, sci-fi, romance, thriller, and drama. For each genre, it gives a brief definition and examples of subgenres that fall under each category. It notes that genres can overlap and provides the example of superhero films, which contain elements of both action and sci-fi. The purpose is to assist readers in understanding how films are categorized based on their stylistic elements, characters, plots, and settings.
